pages.title: Active FE Power Port
pages.text: The Active FE Power Port allows you to insert and extract energy from the Energizer.$(br2)Any Forge Energy-compatible cable or machine can be connected to the Active FE Power Port. The port will automatically transfer energy to the connected block if it supports it.

pages.usage.text: $(l)Mandatory:$() no$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() yes
